mapper.select:
select tab_bas.id,tab_type.c_name,tab_bas.brand_name,tab_dic.name as qyxz_name,tab_bas.chanpmc ,case when tab_bas.complete =0 then '申报中' else '已完成' end as complete,DATE_FORMAT(tab_bas.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as add_time from brand_basic_infor tab_bas,company_type as tab_type,(select * from brand_dictionary where p_code='A') as tab_dic where tab_bas.id in ( select brand_id from sys_user tab_a,brand_user_role tab_b where tab_a.id=tab_b.user_id and tab_a.c_type=tab_b.c_type ) and tab_bas.c_type=tab_type.c_type and tab_bas.gongsixz=tab_dic.code
AND tab_bas.brand_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paraMap.brandName},'%')
order by tab_bas.add_time
